Room.Name: Alcove Entry
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the bottom of a slimy stairway, looking into a large room.
Room.LongDescription: The stairway goes up in a tight, twisting pattern, disappearing quickly. The room you can see has a flickering light coming from it, but you cannot see what is creating it. There is a stinking smell coming from the floor, and a green slime covers the walls.
